resources.string: By pressing this button you can also enter values such as ½ or 1¾ as doses!
To enter a value such as ¾, enter \"3\" in the left field and \"4\" in the right field. \n\nTo enter a whole number, enter that number in the left field and \"1\" in the right field.
If you are taking doses such as 1¾, press this button.
To enter a value such as 1¾, enter \"1\" in the left field, \"3\" in the middle field and \"4\" in the right field.
The menu is accessible by pressing the menu key on your device.
The menu is accessible by pressing the three-dot icon.
